text: As a result, God will consider that you are guilty for killing [SYN] all the righteous people, including killing [MTY] Adamâ€™s son Abel, who was a righteous man [SYN], and Zechariah, the son of Barachiah, whom you are guilty of killing in the holy place between the Temple and the altar, and for killing all the prophets who lived between the times that those two men lived.
